headline: Has GE Vernova (GEV) Run Too Far After 97% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether GE Vernova's share price still makes sense after its run so far, the key question now is how that price compares with the underlying value of the business. The stock last closed at US$737.53, with returns of 2.8% over 7 days, 7.5% over 30 days, 8.5% year to date and 97.2% over the past year, which raises questions about how much of the story is already reflected in the price. Recent company updates and ongoing attention around the business have kept GE Vernova on...
